title: 16th Annual Global Emerging Markets One-on-One Conference
body:
We invite you to meet with senior executives from leading companies from Latin America, Asia, Russia, Eastern Europe, Middle East and Africa over two event-filled days.
Companies from the following industries will be broadly represented:
— Airlines
— Automobile
— Banking/Finance
— Cement & Construction
— Consumer
— Energy
— Food & Beverage
— Healthcare
— Industrials
— Metal & Mining
— Real Estate
— Technology
— Transportation
